ItemDesc: A shield forged with irreplaceable craftsmanship from an unknown alloy. Used to level up Traces moderately for <color=#f29e38ff>Preservation</color> characters.
ItemBGDesc: It may be a large shield, but it feels as light as a feather. Even after taking on a full charge, no marks can be seen on the face of the shield. Ancient legends tell of a war where high-spirited warriors wielded deathray-beaming spears and shields forged of Frost Steel, defended a nation destined to falter in the face of war. This shield is a witness to that war. "Powerful voices chant: 'The enemies are at our gates!'"
